power_sequencer.add_crossfade.description: Adds cross fade between selected sequence and the closest sequence to it's right
power_sequencer.add_crossfade.docstring:
Based on the active strip, finds the closest next sequence
of a similar type, moves it so it overlaps the active strip,
and adds a gamma_cross effect between them.
Works with MOVIE, IMAGE and META strips
power_sequencer.add_crossfade.label: Add Crossfade

power_sequencer.add_speed.description: Adds a speed effect to your clip, sets its speed and size, wraps it into a meta strip set to over drop for easier editing
power_sequencer.add_speed.label: Add Speed

power_sequencer.add_transform_effect.description: Add transform effect to selected image and movie strips. Auto centers images
power_sequencer.add_transform_effect.docstring:
For each strip in the selection:
- Filters the selection down to image and movie strips
- Centers the pivot point of image strips.
- Adds a transform effect and sets it to ALPHA_OVER
power_sequencer.add_transform_effect.label: Add Transform Effect

power_sequencer.border_select.description: Wrapper around Blender's border select, deselects handles
power_sequencer.border_select.label: Border Select

power_sequencer.change_playback_speed.docstring:
Change the playback_speed property using an operator property.
Used with keymaps
power_sequencer.change_playback_speed.label: Change Playback Speed

power_sequencer.channel_offset.description: Move selected strips up or down a channel
power_sequencer.channel_offset.label: Channel Offset

shortcuts.0: keys=Alt, UP_ARROW; function=Move to Open Channel Above
shortcuts.1: keys=Alt, DOWN_ARROW; function=Move to Open Channel Below

power_sequencer.concatenate_strips.docstring:
Concatenates selected strips (removes space between them)
If a single strip is selected, finds all the strips after it in the channel
power_sequencer.concatenate_strips.label: Concatenate Strips

power_sequencer.copy_selected_sequences.description: Copy/cut strips without offset from current time indicator
power_sequencer.copy_selected_sequences.docstring: Copies the selected sequences without frame offset and optionally deletes the selection to give a cut to clipboard effect
power_sequencer.copy_selected_sequences.label: Copy Selected Sequences

power_sequencer.decrease_playback_speed.description: Decrease playback speed incrementally down to normal
power_sequencer.decrease_playback_speed.docstring:
Playback speed may be set to any of the following speeds:

* Normal (1x)
* Fast (1.33x)
* Faster (1.66x)
* Double (2x)
* Triple (3x)

Activating this operator will decrease playback speed through each
of these steps until minimum speed is reached.
power_sequencer.decrease_playback_speed.label: Decrease Playback Speed

power_sequencer.delete_closest_marker.description: Delete the marker closest to the mouse
power_sequencer.delete_closest_marker.label: Delete Closest Marker

power_sequencer.deselect_handles_and_gra.description: Deselect the handles of all selected strips and call the Sequence Slide operator
power_sequencer.deselect_handles_and_gra.docstring:
Deselect the handles of all selected strips and call the
Sequence Slide operator
power_sequencer.deselect_handles_and_gra.label: Deselect Handles And Grab

power_sequencer.edit_crossfade.description: Adjust the location of the crossfade between 2 strips
power_sequencer.edit_crossfade.docstring: Selects the handles of both inputs of a crossfade strip's input and calls the grab operator
power_sequencer.edit_crossfade.label: Edit Crossfade

power_sequencer.fade_strips.description: Fade left, right or both sides of all selected strips in the VSE
power_sequencer.fade_strips.docstring:
Checks if there's a fade animation on a single sequence
If the right fcurve is found,
volume for audio sequences and blend_alpha for other sequences,
Returns a tuple of (fade_fcurve, fade_type)
power_sequencer.fade_strips.label: Fade Strips

power_sequencer.go_to_next_marker.description: Move time cursor to the next marker
power_sequencer.go_to_next_marker.docstring: Moves the time cursor to the next marker
power_sequencer.go_to_next_marker.label: Go To Next Marker

power_sequencer.grab_closest_handle_or_c.description: Grab the closest strip's handle, or cut it
power_sequencer.grab_closest_handle_or_c.docstring:
Selects and grabs the strip handle or cut closest to the mouse cursor.
Hover near a cut and fire this tool to slide it.
power_sequencer.grab_closest_handle_or_c.label: Grab Closest Handle Or Cut

power_sequencer.grab_sequence_handle.description: Grabs the sequence's handle based on the mouse position
power_sequencer.grab_sequence_handle.docstring:
Extends the sequence based on the mouse position.
If the cursor is to the right of the sequence's middle,
it moves the right handle.
If it's on the left side, it moves the left handle.
power_sequencer.grab_sequence_handle.label: Grab Sequence Handles

power_sequencer.import_local_footage.description: Import video and audio from the project folder to VSE strips
power_sequencer.import_local_footage.docstring:
Finds the first empty channel above all others in the VSE
and returns it
power_sequencer.import_local_footage.label: Import Local Footage

power_sequencer.increase_playback_speed.description: Increase playback speed up to triple
power_sequencer.increase_playback_speed.docstring:
Playback speed may be set to any of the following speeds:

* Normal (1x)
* Fast (1.33x)
* Faster (1.66x)
* Double (2x)
* Triple (3x)

Activating this operator will increase playback speed through each
of these steps until maximum speed is reached.
power_sequencer.increase_playback_speed.label: Increase Playback Speed

power_sequencer.make_still_image.description: Make still image from active strip
power_sequencer.make_still_image.docstring:
Converts image under the cursor to a still image, to create
a pause effect in the video, using the active sequence
power_sequencer.make_still_image.label: Make Still Image

power_sequencer.mouse_cut.description: Fast strip cutting based on mouse position
power_sequencer.mouse_cut.docstring: Cuts, trims and remove gaps with mouse clicks
power_sequencer.mouse_cut.label: Mouse Cut Strips

shortcuts.1: keys=Ctrl, ACTIONMOUSE; function=Cut on Mousemove, Keep Gap
shortcuts.2: keys=Ctrl, SELECTMOUSE; function=Cut on Mousemove, Remove Gap

power_sequencer.mouse_toggle_mute.description: Toggle mute status of clicked strips
power_sequencer.mouse_toggle_mute.docstring: Toggle mute a sequence as you click on it
power_sequencer.mouse_toggle_mute.label: Mouse Toggle Mute

power_sequencer.mouse_trim.description: Trim strip from a start to an end frame
power_sequencer.mouse_trim.docstring:
Trims a frame range or a selection from a start to an end frame.
If there's no precise time range, auto trims based on the closest cut

Args:
- frame_start and frame_end (int) define the frame range to trim
power_sequencer.mouse_trim.label: Mouse Trim Strips

shortcuts.0: keys=Ctrl, SELECTMOUSE; function=Trim Strip, Keep Gap
shortcuts.1: keys=Ctrl, Shift, SELECTMOUSE; function=Trim Strip, Remove Gap

power_sequencer.open_project_directory.description: Opens the Blender project directory in file explorer
power_sequencer.open_project_directory.label: Open Project Directory

power_sequencer.preview_last_cut.description: Toggle preview around the last cut, based on time cursor
power_sequencer.preview_last_cut.docstring:
Finds the closest cut to the time cursor and
sets the preview to a small range around that frame.
If the preview matches the range, resets to the full timeline
power_sequencer.preview_last_cut.label: Preview Last Cut

power_sequencer.render_for_web.description: Pick a rendering preset and let Blender name and export the video for you. Replaces strips with proxies if necessary.
power_sequencer.render_for_web.label: Render For Web

power_sequencer.ripple_delete.description: Delete the selected sequences and remove gaps
power_sequencer.ripple_delete.label: Ripple Delete

power_sequencer.save_direct.docstring: Saves current file without prompting for confirmation
power_sequencer.save_direct.label: Save Direct

power_sequencer.select_linked_effect.description: Select all strips that are linked by an effect strip
power_sequencer.select_linked_effect.label: Select Linked Effect

power_sequencer.set_preview_between_mark.description: Set the timeline's preview range using the 2 markers closest to the time cursor
power_sequencer.set_preview_between_mark.label: Set Preview Between Markers

power_sequencer.set_timeline_range.description: Set timeline start and end frame using the time cursor
power_sequencer.set_timeline_range.docstring: Set the timeline start and end frame using the time cursor
power_sequencer.set_timeline_range.label: Set Timeline Range

power_sequencer.set_video_proxies.description: Set all video strips in the current scene as proxies and rebuild using Blender's proxy generation
power_sequencer.set_video_proxies.label: Set Videos Proxies

power_sequencer.smart_snap.description: Trims, extends, and snaps selected strips to cursor
power_sequencer.smart_snap.docstring: Trims, extends and snaps selected strips to cursor
power_sequencer.smart_snap.label: Smart Snap Strip Handles

power_sequencer.snap_marker_to_cursor.description: Snap selected marker to the time cursor
power_sequencer.snap_marker_to_cursor.label: Snap Marker To Cursor

power_sequencer.snap_selection_to_cursor.description: Snap selected strips to the cursor as a block
power_sequencer.snap_selection_to_cursor.docstring: Snap selected strips to the cursor, but as a block
power_sequencer.snap_selection_to_cursor.label: Snap Selection To Cursor

power_sequencer.synchronize_titles.description: Snap the selected image or text strips to the corresponding title marker
power_sequencer.synchronize_titles.docstring:
Snap the selected image or text strips to the corresponding title 
marker. The marker and strip names have to start with TITLE-001
power_sequencer.synchronize_titles.label: Synchronize Titles

power_sequencer.toggle_preview_selected_.description: Sets the preview range based on selected sequences
power_sequencer.toggle_preview_selected_.docstring: Sets the preview range based on selected sequences
power_sequencer.toggle_preview_selected_.label: Toggle Preview Selected Strips

power_sequencer.toggle_waveforms.description: Toggle drawing of waveforms for selected strips or for all strips if no selection is active
power_sequencer.toggle_waveforms.label: Toggle Waveforms

power_sequencer.trim_to_surrounding_cuts.docstring: Find the two closest cuts, trims and deletes all strips above in the range but leaves some margin. Removes the newly formed gap.
power_sequencer.trim_to_surrounding_cuts.label: Trim To Surrounding Cuts
